front.title: Composite ML-DSA For use in X.509 Public Key Infrastructure and CMS

abstract.t: This document defines combinations of ML-DSA [FIPS.204] in hybrid with traditional algorithms RSA-PKCS#1v1.5, RSA-PSS, ECDSA, Ed25519, and Ed448. These combinations are tailored to meet security best practices and regulatory requirements. Composite ML-DSA is applicable in any application that uses X.509, PKIX, and CMS data structures and protocols that accept ML-DSA, but where the operator wants extra protection against breaks or catastrophic bugs in ML-DSA.
